page.title: 12Recreation
page.content: Organised recreation is centred on Halvergate. The village owns a sports field which has a pavilion and a licensed club room. This is a recent aquisition. The main league sports are football, cricket, bowls and table tennis. Tennis courts are being developed. There is also a model aircraft club with a predominantly adult membership. At the Public House in Halvergate, darts, snooker, pool and cribbage are regularly played. The primary school at Halvergate involves children in netball, football and rounders. Gardening is popular in the area, as is horse riding.
